name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary: Dynamic Senior Cybersecurity Engineer with a robust foundation in **Cybersecurity**, **Network Security**, **Cloud Security**, and **Risk Management**. A proven communicator adept at collaborating with teams to drive security initiatives and align solutions with industry standards.
